Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGRAVED
Description: Large pale red ovoid jar with a low neck and roll-shaped lip. On the carefully smoothed body is an incised mark showing a highly schematised individual holding a stick, and something that could represent an animal. This mark was incised after the vase had been fired.
